Articles.Content:
I don't know if someone ever made this topic but I've been searching a very long time for artifacts on Minmus and I can't seem to find them...

I use ISA Mapsat to locate the artifacts and Monolith finder to find them, I foudn all artifacts on the Mun but at Minmus they aren't even there?!

Also when I got right at the spot of an artifact the game crashed when I went on EVA, I posted that on the bug forum...

My question is:

Are there artifacts on Minmus like a Monolith or an arch???

If you found something please let me know something and (maybe) send a screenshot.

Many thanks
I heard there is one on Minmus, but it is hard to find, if you search the forums for easter eggs you might find one of the old posts with a clue on how to find it.
Heres a tip for you, the monolith isn't on the surface of Minmus..

oh no, my carefully planned landing pointless, such a senseless death from jetpacking too fast into the ground =) Guess I need to search again. Waited forever for the sun too. *grumble*

Time to go put together some sort of rover.
Don't bother using a rover to find Minmus artifacts.. unless said rover can fly..
Yeah, I'll be the one to stop skating around the fact and say that it's in orbit around minmus.

Yeah, I'll be the one to stop skating around the fact and say that it's in orbit around minmus.

It's not actually in orbit. It's always over the same place,but is much too low for geosynchronous orbit.
